Player History

Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1968, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...

Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1968, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...

Won Cy Young Award in 1968, going 28-6, 1.53 ERA...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1969, going 7-0, 1.29...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1970, going 24-9, 1.71 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Los Angeles on 7/13/1972, striking out 8...
Injured on 5/21/1973 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/1/1973 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
Drafted in 5th round, 84th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1976...
Injured on 5/28/1977 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/23/1978 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 8/3/1979 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/15/1981 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 5/21/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 7/31/1981 (Going to TEX: 2B C. Walker, P E. Vande Berg, P S. Bahnsen, P G. Zahn. Going to CLE: CF L. Hisle, 3B K. Oberkfell)...
Injured on 4/4/1982 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/21/1984, off Don Eddy (CAL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (A) on 8/16/1984...
Hit first career homerun on 8/21/1984, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1984, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1984, hitting .412 with 2 HR, 17 RBI...
Injured on 9/3/1985 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (A) on 4/22/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/14/1987 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/26/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $1,350,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 94th overall pick, by Detroit in 1997...
